title: Russia’s halt of European gas could see 'catastrophic' winter pricing, veteran trader warns
content:
1. Russia’s halt of European gas could see 'catastrophic' winter pricing, veteran trader warns  CNBC
  2. EU accuses Russia of 'blackmail' after it cuts gas to Poland, Bulgaria  Fox News
  3. Russian Gas Stoppages Spur Europe’s Race for New Energy Supplies  The Wall Street Journal
  4. What is the EU's stance on Russia's roubles gas payment demand?  Reuters.com
  5. Editorial: Russia is doing the west's work in cutting gas to Bulgaria and Poland  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: ロシアによる欧州のガス供給停止で、冬の価格設定が「破滅的」になる可能性があると、ベテラントレーダーが警告している。
资深交易员警告说，俄罗斯停止供应欧洲天然气可能会看到 "灾难性的 "冬季定价
資深交易員警告說，俄羅斯停止供應歐洲天然氣可能會看到 "災難性的 "冬季定價
